servinfosub.title: For ECM Replacement
servinfosub.ptxt: Using SUZUKI scan tool, be sure to register the following vehicle information taken from old ECM to new one or substitute ECM as follows.

item.ptxt: Key verification code (for immobilizer control system)
For further details of SUZUKI scan tool, refer to its operator’s manual.

If these vehicle information cannot be read from old ECM, register/initialize them according to Registration Procedure for the Fuel Injector Calibration Code , EGR Valve Data Initialization , Diesel Particulate Filter Data Initialization and Procedure after ECM Replacement .

s1.ptxt: Register fuel injector calibration codes as follows.

s2.ptxt: Connect SUZUKI scan tool to DLC with ignition switch OFF.
Turn ignition switch to ON position.
Select “Replace ECM” of “ECM Setting” under “Miscellaneous test” (“Misc test”) mode of SUZUKI scan tool.
Read fuel injector calibration codes and Diesel Particulate Filter (DPF) data* from old ECM by performing “IMA and DPF data register”.
Replace old ECM with new or substitute ECM referring to Engine Control Module (ECM) Removal and Installation .
Install calibration data to ECM if ECM is replaced with new one.
Write injector calibration codes and DPF data* to new one or substituted ECM by performing “IMA and DPF data register”.
Turn ignition switch to OFF position, and wait 120 seconds or more.

s1.ptxt: Register key verification code into ECM referring to Procedure after ECM Replacement .
Register key verification code to reprogrammed ECM referring to Procedure after ECM Replacement .

attention3.ptxt: Once ECM reprogramming is executed, vehicle information, i.e. fuel injector calibration codes and DPF, are cleared from ECM.

After ECM reprogramming is executed, register/initialize them according to Registration Procedure for the Fuel Injector Calibration Code , EGR Valve Data Initialization , Diesel Particulate Filter Data Initialization , and Procedure after ECM Replacement .

s1.ptxt: Activate cruise control system as follows. (cruise control model)

s2.ptxt: Push cruise control “MAIN (ON/OFF)” switch for 5 seconds.
